Name: Idle Superpowers
About the game: Idle Superpowers is a roguelike idle rpg where you are a superhero who can get multiple superpowers that are combinable and synergize with each other! - 99+ superpowers to unlock - random generation of powers ensures that each run plays different - combine superpowers to create overpowered synergies - procedural generated items and enemies - challenges to unlock new upgrades, which require different playstyles Saves are compatible to mobile and web version Includes Starter Pack
Meta Title: Idle Superpowers: Jan 5, 2022, Lutsgames and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Idle Superpowers? Check out the release date (Jan 5, 2022), developer insights from Lutsgames, and a complete game summary.
